DOC.criteria: Intensive care unit patient intubate least 24 hour least four follow risk factor : age 65 year , underlie chronic cardiac lung disease , mechanical ventilation 7 day . age 18 year peripheral central nervous system pathology know psychiatric pathology agitation patient decision reintubation patient refusal clinical worsening polysomnography ( shock vasopressor drug , coma , PaO2/FiO2 ratio < 150 respiratory distress sign , coma Glasgow scale < 8 ) pregnant breastfeed woman patient legal guardianship protection patient health insurance coverage age < 18 year
